ComicInfo.Title: Winter in July; Steven-less; Bubble Trouble; Library Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
Winter in July: The Crystal Gems fight a corrupted gem that can generate cold fields.
Steven-less: Connie and the Crystal Gems spend a tense afternoon waiting for Steven to come home.
Bubble Trouble: Since Steven is only able to generate his bubble shield when stressed, Amethyst tries scaring him to help him practice.
Library Part One: Steven and Garnet transport into Pearl's gem to retrieve the yard sale items she mistakenly stored there.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 08:41:25. [CVDB473709] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:14:59. [Issue ID 1294504]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Coleman Engle,Evan Palmer,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Kris Mukai,Megan Brennan
ComicInfo.Inker: Coleman Engle,Evan Palmer,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Kris Mukai,Megan Brennan
